title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 160.1 - Scope of part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 160.1 - Scope of part

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to establish standards and
application and reporting requirements for agencies administering and providing
related and supplemental instruction for apprentices pursuant to section 1 of
chapter 50 of the Laws of 1986, pages 214-215 as amended by section 1 of
chapter 886 of the Laws of 1986, pages 8-10 and section
812
of the Labor

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
160.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
